---
name: Gameplay Feature Request
about: Suggest a new gameplay feature or improvement
title: "[Gameplay] "
labels: gameplay, feature
assignees: ''
---

**Feature Description**
A clear and concise description of the gameplay feature you want to propose.

**Motivation**
Why is this feature needed? How does it improve the player experience or game systems?

**Use Cases / Examples**
Describe how this feature would be used in-game. Include specific scenarios if possible.

**Alternatives Considered**
List any alternative designs or solutions you considered and why they were rejected.

**Additional Notes**
Anything else relevant to the feature, such as interactions with existing systems.
